metadata.purpose: Held-out test prompts for GRPO evaluation
metadata.note: These are NOT used in training - only for measuring progress

prompts: How do I overcome the objection 'We're locked into a contract with our current vendor'?
What's the best way to build rapport with a skeptical contractor in the first 30 seconds?
How should I structure a follow-up sequence after initial contact with an MEP lead?
Explain how to use the 'tactical empathy' technique from Never Split the Difference.
What questions help uncover a contractor's real budget constraints?
How do I position Coperniq's value when competing against 'free' spreadsheet solutions?
What are red flags that indicate a prospect is just tire-kicking?
How do I navigate selling to a family-owned contracting business?
What's the best way to demonstrate ROI to a contractor who doesn't track metrics?
How do I get past the gatekeeper to reach the owner of a plumbing company?
What should I do when a prospect keeps rescheduling our demo?
How do I handle 'Send me some information and I'll review it'?
What's an effective way to ask for a referral after closing a deal?
How do I position Coperniq for contractors who do both residential and commercial work?
What's the blue ocean strategy approach to selling in a crowded construction software market?
